title: Frontend Developer
description: Frontend developer with experience designing, developing, and maintaining user-friendly and responsive web apps. Utilize language capabilities to collaborate cross-functionally with multiple teams and stakeholders to deliver projects on-time and within budget.

GFAL.title: Frontend Developer
GFAL.description: Spearheading the frontend development of the company's cutting-edge marketplace, gfal.market, as well as the authentication platform GFAL ID. The projects integrate multiple services, including the marketplace backend, a custom cryptocurrency exchange rate service and web3 cryptocurrency wallets with account abstraction, and also prioritze a user-friendly, responsive, and performant website experience.

Chingu.title: Volunteer Frontend Developer
Chingu.description: Collaborated remotely with an international team to develop responsiveweb applications using agile and scrum methodologies.

InvictoAI.description: Invicto AI is an innovative platform designed to empower crypto investors with advanced portfolio tracking and AI-driven insights. Our proprietary language model, trained on data from top crypto traders, provides real-time recommendations tailored to your investment strategies.

gameState.description: gameState is an app created with Nuxt and Firebase to search for videogames using the Twitch IGDB API and saving them two one of two lists: games played and games to play. Includes stats, screenshot galleries and more.

SignWise.description: SignWise redefines user interactions with blockchain technology by providing innovative solutions to prevalent challenges. A Web2 experience with Web3 security & ownership. We make it simple: Own your assets & be your own bank, no gas fees, social login, (no seedphrases), frictionless experience.

SoundScribe.description: A social media app where users can sign up to become Scribes, posting blog-style notes that must include a music video, or a Sounder, to simply browse the notes left by Scribes, leaving likes and comments.

CryptoWorld.description: Collaborated in a Chingu team project to create a dashboard with cryptocurrency information pulled from the CoinGecko API. Rendered with React using the Ant Design Muse Dashboard. Worked using agile/scrum methodologies and a kanban board with 3 other developers. My personal contributions include setting up user authentication and connecting the database, creating a favorite coin watchlist, storing the favorite coins in the database for each user.

toDo.description: A to-do app created with React, TypeScript, and Firebase Realtime Database to keep track of tasks and projects. I later created an updated version with Nuxt, converting it to a PWA, improving the log in flow and animations and working on additional features.

rockPaperScissors.description: A rock paper scissors game played against a computer and created without a framework using TypeScript, HTML and CSS.
